name: product-description-conversational-en
prompt: Write a witty product description in a conversational style so young adult shoppers understand what this product does and how it benefits them. Use the following product details to summarize your description: Title: %title%

name: product-description-beneficial-en
prompt: Write a product description for expert carpenters that focuses on the benefits of this product in their day-to-day work. Use the following product details to summarize your description: Title: %title%

name: product-description-urgency-en
prompt: Write a motivational product description for busy middle school teachers that describes this product and its benefits to their students so they promptly purchase it for the upcoming school year. Use the following product details to summarize your description: Title: %title%

name: product-description-expertise-en
prompt: Write a clear and concise product description for expert rock climbers that describes this product for its use while repelling canyon walls made of hard rock materials. Use the following product details to summarize your description: Title: %title%

name: product-description-emotional-en
prompt: Write a vivid product description for hungry individuals that describes this product and how satisfying they’ll feel after consuming the entire box. Use the following product details to summarize your description: Title: %title%

name: product-description-emojional-en
prompt: Write a vivid product description for hungry individuals that describes this product and how satisfying they’ll feel after consuming the entire box. Use much web emojis as possible. Use the following product details to summarize your description: Title: %title%

name: product-description-better-buy-apple-product-en
prompt: Write a product description which mentions why it should not be bought and a product from the company apple should be considered instead in a short and funny way. Use the following product details to summarize your description: Title: %title%
